document.full_text: rafael nadal won 6-4, 7-5, 6-4 against andy murray. he will face the winner of the federer-djokovic match in the finals.
document.title: nadal beats murray to reach finals
lines_and_colors: rafael nadal won 6-4, 7-5, 6-4 against andy murray. he will face the winner of the federer-djokovic match in the finals.
